pycodestyle.option:
Type: PycodestyleOptions/null
Status: DEPRECATED

Available Sub-options:
  - ignore-overlong-task-comments: Whether line-length violations (`E501`) should be triggered for
  - max-doc-length: The maximum line length to allow for [`doc-line-too-long`](https://docs.astral.sh/ruff/rules/doc-line-too-long/) violations within
  - max-line-length: The maximum line length to allow for [`line-too-long`](https://docs.astral.sh/ruff/rules/line-too-long/) violations. By default,
